body:
Spack should search again for compilers in already-found variants to detect when a new compiler has been added to a previous installation by a package manager, e.g., apt

I added gfortran after spack complained that mpich requires f77 support. Spack would not detect the new compiler until I removed ~/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml to force it to search for compilers again.
title: Update compiler configuration without requiring a remove
